headline: Looking For Yields: Evergy, Sempra, And Philip Morris Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Evergy, Sempra, and Philip Morris have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of over 3%. Evergy Evergy (NASDAQ:EVRG) engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and sale of electricity in the U.S. It generates electricity through coal, landfill gas, uranium, and natural gas and
